com.bigdata.service.ndx.pipeline

Class KVOC<O>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bigdata.btree.keys.KVO<O>
      • com.bigdata.service.ndx.pipeline.KVOList<O>
        • com.bigdata.service.ndx.pipeline.KVOC<O>
  • Type Parameters:
    O - The generic type of the unserialized value object.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Comparable<KVO<O>>

    public class KVOC<O>
extends KVOList<O>
    Extends KVOList to provide handshaking with a KVOLatch.

    Note: IDuplicateRemovers MUST create a list from the identified duplicates so that the KVOLatch of each duplicate as well as the original are decremented after a successful write. Failure to do this will cause a Latch.dec() to be "lost" and generally results in non-termination of Latch.await() since the count for the "lost" latch would never reach zero.

    Version:
    $Id$
    Author:
    Bryan Thompson

    • Method Detail

      • done

        public void done()
        Extended to decrement the KVOLatch. This inherits from KVOList, which maps KVOList.done() over the list of duplicates. This ensures that all latches are decremented once the original value has been successfully written onto an index partition.
        Overrides:
        done in class KVOList<O>
